pgrid.core.index
Class IndexManager

java.lang.Object
  pgrid.core.index.IndexManager

public class IndexManager
extends Object

This class represents the file manager for all shared and downloaded files. This class implements the Singleton pattern as defined by Gamma et.al. As there could only exist one instance of this class, other clients must use the sharedInstance function to use this class.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Roman Schmidt

insertIndexEntries

public void insertIndexEntries(Collection items,
                               boolean distribute)
Inserts the given data items.

Parameters:
items - the items to insert.
distribute - True iff dataitem insertion should be propagated into the network through the distributor mechanism

insertIndexEntriesInBulk

public void insertIndexEntriesInBulk(Collection items,
                                     boolean distribute)
Inserts the given data items in BULK. All the items will be inserted localy. Once bulk insert is done call for disributing the records into the network

Parameters:
items - the items to insert.
distribute - True iff dataitem insertion should be propagated into the network through the distributor mechanism

addIndexListener

public void addIndexListener(IndexListener listener,
                             Type type)
Register a listener of events related to data items. Such listeners are notified when operations on items on the the current node are requested.

Parameters:
listener - the listener to register
type - the type of data items that the listener is interested in

addIndexListener

public void addIndexListener(IndexListener listener)
Register a listener of events related to data items. Such listeners are notified when operations on items of any type on the the current node are requested.

Parameters:
listener - the listener to register

removeIndexListener

public void removeIndexListener(IndexListener listener,
                                Type type)
Removed a registered listener.

Parameters:
listener - the listener to register
type - the type of data items that the listener is interested in

public DBIndexTable getPredictionSubset()
Returns the prediction subset. This set is used to estimate data distribution in the exchanger. This method is not synchronized.

the prediction subset.
